meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle:
Electrical and Mechanical Services Department Workshop Services Suspense Account and Electrical and Mechanical Services Department Suspense Account
Resolution of the Provisional Legislative Council
main.text: Resolution made and passed by the Provisional Legislative Council under section 30 of the Public Finance Ordinance (Cap. 2) on 17 December 1997.
main.leadIn: Resolved that with effect from 31 December 1997—

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: the Electrical and Mechanical Services Department Workshop Services Suspense Account shall be closed and the resolution of the then Legislative Council relating to the account made and passed on 24 February 1993 (Cap. 2 sub. leg. F) shall be cancelled accordingly; (E.R. 1 of 2017)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the Electrical and Mechanical Services Department Suspense Account shall be closed and the resolution of the then Legislative Council relating to the account made and passed on 28 November 1990 (Cap. 2 sub. leg. K) shall be cancelled accordingly. (E.R. 1 of 2017)
